pages.text: In a dangerous world, full of monsters and potentially other players, you'll need to setup a home base relatively quickly. Wanderers are prime meat for others.$(br2)You'll want to consider a few things for your base:$(li1)Location - Living in a desert might keep other players out, but you'll also need to consider food sources.

Along with location, consider other nearby establishments. Are they friendly? Perhaps make a peace offering. If they're hostile, better move along.$(li1)Security - How strong are you gonna make this? Does it need to keep a chest full of loot secure, or is it just a dirt hut?$(li1)Visibility - Being able to see around you is important for ensuring enemies can't sneak up on you. Will you build outposts?

You might decide outposts are unnecessary for you. If you prefer stealth, consider building underground with a hidden entrance. Beware that you might not see your opponents lurking around!$(br2)There are always more things to consider, but those are a few you should really ponder.

pages.title: Endless Possibilities!
pages.text: Your base can be whatever you want.
